Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART EIGHT - BUSINESS REGULATION AND TAXATION CODE

TITLE TWO - Business Regulation

CHAPTER 826 Signs

826.01 SHORT TITLE.

826.02 INTENT.

826.03 DEFINITIONS.

826.04 UNREGULATED SIGNS.

826.05 REGULATED SIGNS NOT REQUIRING A PERMIT.

826.06 SIGNS PERMITTED IN ALL SIGN DISTRICTS.

826.07 SIGNS PROHIBITED IN ALL SIGN DISTRICTS.

826.08 SIGNS PERMITTED IN INDUSTRIAL SIGN DISTRICTS.

826.09 SIGNS PERMITTED IN COMMERCIAL SIGN DISTRICTS.

826.10 SIGNS PERMITTED IN ARCHITECTURAL SIGN DISTRICTS.

826.11 SIGNS PERMITTED IN RESIDENTIAL SIGN DISTRICTS.

826.12 INTERSTATE HIGHWAY SIGNS.

826.13 SIGNS ON UNDEVELOPED PROPERTY.

826.14 SIGNS OVER A STREET, ALLEY OR DRIVEWAY.

826.15 SIGNS OVER A PEDESTRIAN WALKWAY.

826.16 SIGN MAINTENANCE REQUIRED.

826.17 OBSOLETE SIGNS PROHIBITED.

826.18 NONCONFORMING SIGNS.

826.19 SIGNS ASSOCIATED WITH NONCONFORMING LAND USES.

826.20 SIGN PERMIT APPLICATION AND FEES.

826.21 ENFORCEMENT RESPONSIBILITY.

826.22 REMOVAL OF UNLAWFUL SIGNS.

826.23 APPEALS AND FEES.

826.24 VARIANCES AND FEES.

826.25 ADMINISTRATIVE INTERPRETATIONS AND APPLICANT APPEALS.

826.26 SIGN DISTRICT MAP.

826.27 SEVERABILITY.

826.99 PENALTY.
